mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(i.in_code, p.pd_lot) AS in_code, i.product_code, m.name, m.category, CONCAT(i.in_quantity, i.unit) AS quantity, i.in_regdate FROM in_warehouse i JOIN meta_data_product m ON i.product_code = m.product_code JOIN product p ON i.pd_lot = p.pd_lot
SELECT CONCAT(in_code, pd_lot) AS in_code, product_code, name, in_quantity, unit, category, in_regdate FROM in_warehouse WHERE CONCAT(in_code, pd_lot) = #{in_code}
